title: Constructive Cost Model II
author: Dr. Barry Boehm
description: COCOMO II is a parametric software cost estimation model used to estimate the effort, cost, and schedule required to develop software systems. It relates software size (e.g., source lines of code or function points) and cost drivers—such as product complexity, personnel capability, and development environment—to predicted development effort using empirically derived equations. COCOMO II is widely used to support planning and trade-off analysis for modern software-intensive systems.
